about_the_game:
You play as the Spirit of the Crucified Savior, who is on a Journey to descend into Hell, to battle demons, find the Captives and defeat the Evil One. The Savior must fight to rescue the lost Captives ever since the banishment from the Garden of Eden, and bring them back into Paradise.

Enter into the underworld to a scorched landscape filled with evil creatures, danger zones and projectiles. Destroy the Spires to open up the Cells to collect the Captives. Play on the path as you unravel the mystery of the Evil One and his part in all of this.

Key Features:


(Note: This is for BETA 1, game is still in development)

  • Player Shoots Projectiles and pick up Health
  • Enemy AI tracks and finds Player's Location
  • Captives are trapped inside Cells by Spires
  • Time Base Levels with a vast Environment
  • Story Based Cut-Scenes as you progress
  • Pixel Art Graphics (wip) with Optional Full-Screen Experience
  • Musical Score with Action Related Sound Effects

short_description: 3 Days in the Abyss is a Biblical based 2D Top Down Action game, where the Spirit of the Savior must traverse through Hell for three days to find the Righteous Captives.
